xml:
Decapeptyl<tm tmtype="reg"/> SR 22.5mg Indications and dose

Locally advanced non-metastatic prostate cancer as an alternative to surgical castration

Metastatic prostate cancer

Adjuvant treatment to radiotherapy in high-risk localised or locally advanced prostate cancer

Neoadjuvant treatment prior to radiotherapy in patients with high-risk localised or locally advanced prostate cancer

Adjuvant treatment to radical prostatectomy in patients with locally advanced prostate cancer at high risk of disease progression

By intramuscular injection

  • Adult

    22.5 mg every 6 months.

 Prescribing and dispensing information

Each vial includes an overage to allow accurate administration of a 22.5 mg dose.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
